scripts.import: node -e "var result = require('./Core').import(process.argv[1])(...(eval(process.argv[2] || '[]'))); (result + '').includes('Promise') ? result.catch(e => e).then(r => console.log(r)) : console.log(result)"
scripts.ssh:install: npm run ssh "cd ~/jupytangular && npm run install:minimal && sudo npm run install:aws"
scripts.ssh:deploy: npm run ssh "cd ~/jupytangular && npm run git:rebase"
scripts.ssh:git: npm run ssh -- "cd ~/jupytangular && $(npm run -s interpret:bash "git auto rebase")"
scripts.start:selenium: npm run import "set up selenium server" && docker exec -it act-selenium bash
scripts.export:firebase: npm run export -- "[['firebase rpc wrapper', 'tell joke', 'latest s3 bucket', 'calendar search heatmap', 'spawn child process', 'github html commit acl']]"
scripts.export:notebook: npm run export -- "[['import notebooks modules', 'find project files']]"
scripts.test: npm run test:all && npm run schedule:update
scripts.test:blog: rimraf ./.output && npm run import "test google sheets resources" -- "['https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gFwCsCHvPmXxy56AXCnJIfcIEzMW60mQxyXPPJTUpx8/edit#gid=0', 'corinnecreates.sheet-to-web.com']"
scripts.test:sheet: rimraf ./.output && npm run import "test google sheets resources" -- "['https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QeZ3WduNFmjtNf_Q3Xe5zAh8dzP_nn7nr-AQU0_hXg8/edit#gid=0', 'sheet-to-web.com']"
scripts.test:shop: rimraf ./.output && npm run import "test google sheets resources" -- "['https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/113mVIumItArQ_oXpfDRXP-2Kw2ms4t48oPJ68_p5P8k/edit#gid=0', 'shopilluminati.com']"
scripts.test:study: npm run import "test google sheets resources" -- "['https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EGwxT6InTXuvpLujnwKV3asEFDZhhZk2LdosjW2Tz_M/edit#gid=0', 'studysauce.com']"
scripts.test:resume: rimraf ./.output && npm run import "test google sheets resources" -- "['https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dAtBQyn5vwStM6ITn7iCpp996Sus26k0bJtbGNlCX2g/edit#gid=0', 'resume.sheet-to-web.com']"
scripts.test:heatmap: npm run import "test google calendar search heatmap" -- "[['study sauce']]"
scripts.test:git: npm run import "convert git history to google calendar events"
scripts.test:call: npm run import "make a twilio call" -- "['4803328884']"
scripts.test:create: npm run test:cells -- "['test google sheet create']"
scripts.test:permissions: npm run test:cells -- "['test list google drive']"
scripts.test:copy: npm run import "create a copy of marketing template" -- "['megamindbrian@gmail.com']"
scripts.test:drive: npm run import "list google drive files"
scripts.test:sheet:update: npm run import "update interests resume sheet"
scripts.test:study:copy: npm run import "create a copy of study sauce template" -- "['megamindbrian@gmail.com']"
scripts.test:study:cards: npm run import "render study cards page"
scripts.test:study:auth: npm run import "authorize app to read profile info"
scripts.watch: npm run import "watch files run tests"
scripts.deploy:contact:illuminati: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:contact && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" contactIlluminati
scripts.deploy:contact:brian: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:contact  && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" contactBrian
scripts.deploy:sheet:info: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:sheet:info && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" getSheet
scripts.deploy:sheet:import: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:sheet:import && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" importSheet
scripts.deploy:sheet:backend: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:sheet:backend && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" setupBackend
scripts.deploy:sheet:create: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:sheet:create && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" createSheet
scripts.deploy:sheet: npm run deploy:sheet:info && npm run deploy:sheet:import && npm run deploy:sheet:backend && npm run deploy:sheet:create
scripts.deploy:shop: npm run deploy:shop:import && npm run deploy:shop:backend
scripts.deploy:study: npm run deploy:study:import && npm run deploy:study:backend && npm run deploy:study:copy && npm run deploy:study:cards && npm run deploy:study:auth
scripts.deploy:study:copy: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:study:copy && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" createStudyPack
scripts.deploy:study:cards: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:study:cards && npm run copy:credentials && npm run exec "deploy cloud function" createCards
scripts.deploy:study:auth: rimraf ./.functions && npm run export:study:auth && npm run copy:credentials
scripts.deploy:marketing: npm run deploy:marketing:import && npm run deploy:marketing:backend
scripts.deploy:blog: npm run deploy:blog:import && npm run deploy:blog:backend
scripts.deploy:resume: npm run deploy:resume:import && npm run deploy:resume:backend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:minimal && npm run install:webdriver && npm install:extras && npm install:export
scripts.install:minimal: npm install node jsonpath-plus glob fuse.js gulp rimraf
scripts.install:aws: npm run exec "install aws vnc selenium" && npm run install:webdriver
scripts.install:extras: npm install lodash chrono-node googleapis @google/cloud-storage chrono-node imap jsdom remarkable d3-node google-auth-library mustache
